node.html: Food recipe sharing social media app with diverse cultural heritage. Upload images and videos of your family recipes and search your favorite recipes by cuisines.

node.html: A full-stack drawing web application to share and create doodles. Featuring account authentication and full CRUD. Collaborated with Aleksa Radevish.

node.html: Pinterest inspired video sharing social media web application. Search video and save it from the app. Custom Vimeo and YouTube link address formatting module allows Vimeo and YouTube links to be embedded.
